Text: how come i don't have any sound?
i have 20 seconds of sound then it goes off for the rest of the film. do i need a codec or similar to get audio??
The movie is really clear, but it would be nice if there was sound...

Perfect video quality, the sound on the avi is all the way through, I suggest the other users check that their video codecs are up to date.  Many thanks, my boy has been after this for a couple of weeks.
